content:
# FACTORIO AGENT REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 3.0)
- Steam engine at (1.5, 7.5)
- Connected with pipes forming a water and steam network
- Power pole at (3.5, 7.5) connecting steam engine
- System is now operational with coal fuel in the boiler

### Iron Mining and Processing System
#### Iron Mining Operation 1 at (17.5, 72.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at (17.5, 72.5)
- Wooden chest at (17.5, 70.5) for collecting iron ore (currently full with 800 iron ore)
- Inserter at (18.5, 70.5) to move ore from chest to belt
- Connected to power network
- Mining drill is working but output is blocked due to full chest

#### Iron Mining Operation 2 at (18.5, 78.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at (18.5, 78.5)
- Wooden chest at (18.5, 76.5) for collecting iron ore (contains 538 iron ore)
- Connected to power network
- Mining drill is working

#### Iron Smelting at (21.5, 76.5)
Consists of:
- Electric furnace at (21.5, 76.5)
- Connected to power network
- Output inserter at (21.5, 79.5) to move iron plates
- Wooden chest at (21.5, 80.5) for collecting iron plates
- Input chest at (21.5, 73.5) for receiving iron ore
- Input inserter at (21.5, 74.5) to move ore from chest to furnace
- Transport belt system connecting mining operations to furnace
- Additional inserter at (18.5, 74.5) for moving items from mining area
- Underground belt entrance at (19.5, 70.5) and exit at (21.5, 70.5)
- Transport belts at (21.5, 71.5) and (21.5, 72.5) facing down
- Furnace contains 5 iron plates but currently has no ingredients to smelt

### Copper Mining and Processing System
#### Copper Mining Operation at (-47.5, 78.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at (-47.5, 78.5)
- Wooden chest at (-47.5, 76.5) for collecting copper ore (contains 502 copper ore)
- Inserter at (-46.5, 76.5) to move ore from chest to belt
- Connected to power network
- Mining drill is working

#### Copper Smelting at (-43.5, 79.5)
Consists of:
- Electric furnace at (-43.5, 79.5)
- Connected to power network
- Output inserter at (-43.5, 82.5) to move copper plates
- Wooden chest at (-43.5, 83.5) for collecting copper plates
- Transport belt system connecting mining operation to furnace
- Furnace contains 6 copper plates but currently has no ingredients to smelt

### Manufacturing Complex
#### Copper Cable Production at (30.5, 30.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (30.5, 30.5) set to produce copper cables
- Input inserter at (27.5, 30.5) to feed copper plates
- Copper plate chest at (24.5, 30.5) containing 10 copper plates
- Output inserter at (30.5, 33.5) to move produced cables
- Output chest at (30.5, 35.5) for collecting copper cables
- Connected to power network
- Machine is operational but currently has output full with 40 copper cables

#### Iron Gear Wheel Production at (40.5, 30.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (40.5, 30.5) set to produce iron gear wheels
- Input chest at (34.5, 30.5) containing 96 iron plates
- Input inserter at (37.5, 30.5) to
